file_content.text: For years, I've dreamed of vanquishing Darth Vengean. Glad to have had a hand in it.
He fought hard and well.
You don't get to be a member of the Dark Council unless you can back it up.
What did you expect?
He was nothing.
You were remarkable.
He seemed surprised by your strength, Draahg.
As did you.
I always held back in his presence. Something Baras told me to do.
I have no delusions I would have survived this battle if it wasn't for you. This is your victory.
You, Baras and I will be unstoppable.
Absolutely.
Keep your ambition in check, Draahg. I'd hate to end your tenure with us prematurely.
Know your place.
I have no plan nor desire to disturb the hierarchy.
Someday, this will be our fate.
Until we're not.
I predict that day won't come for a very long time.
There are things I must clean up here for Baras. I will meet you back at his chambers.
We mustn't delay. Every moment Darth Vengean communes in his sanctum brings him closer to full strength.
You're every bit as proficient as Baras said.
If I can inspire you, good. I need you strong and confident for what's to come.
Soak it up.
I know what we're up against.
I don't like false praise, Draahg.
Don't flatter me.
Then believe that it's sincere.
I guess you're content to sit on the sidelines.
Some people are watchers.
I saw you had it handled, and I needed a little time to recover.
I almost didn't make it. There were traps in the passages.
I got the key. But Darth Vengean probably knows we're coming.
We will take him down whether he is prepared or not.
It won't matter.
I will feed off your confidence.
If so, it's your fault.
I blame you.
I'll make it up to you in the fight to come.
I don't care. Use the key and let's get inside.
Just open the gate.
As you say.
If I should fall, I want you to know it was an honor to fight and die alongside you.
I'm catching my breath before venturing out. Fight your way to the gate to Darth Vengean's inner sanctum. I'll meet you there when I've reclaimed the secret key.
Lord Draahg, Baras sent me. I'm administering a resuscitation stimulant.
I... I'm grateful. To you and to Baras. I look forward to serving him directly once Darth Vengean has been destroyed.
We have been ordered to do just that.
Then you're in luck.
Then we better begin. Vengean grows more powerful every moment.
Tell me you know how to find him.
Where is he?
Take your time, Draahg. I need you at full strength.
Recover your stamina.
No, we must push on. Every moment, Vengean becomes more powerful.
He's in his inner sanctum, communing with the dark side, channeling his rage and power.
We have to confront Darth Vengean there, but it won't be easy to access.
Tell me what this invasion will entail.
What's involved?
I'm ready for anything.
Good. We need to be ready for anything. I know Darth Vengean well--he'll have tricks up his sleeve.
It wouldn't be fun unless it was difficult.
Easy is boring.
Baras told me you were spirited. Nice to see you come as billed.
Three outer rings of this compound must be breached before we can reach the inner sanctum, then a key is needed to enter.
It's Darth Vengean's personal key, but I made a copy and hid it. I'll retrieve the key while you break through the outer rings.
Then I'll meet you at the gates to Vengean's inner sanctum.
Sounds good.
Why don't I just come with you?
We should stick together.
To get the key, I have to be stealthy and use secret passages without being seen. Something tells me you'd be noticed.
What will I be fighting?
Tell me what stands in my way.
Darth Vengean oversees the Imperial military during times of war. He's cherry-picked the very best to serve him.
You run the gauntlet of Darth Vengean's security; I swear to you I'll do whatever it takes to deliver the key.
You'll see, we'll make a great team.
